exec: * Our sandbox environment provides the means by which to perform limited testing of our API calls without requiring real user accounts. (e.g. to test formatting, errors etc)

* This is as described for the real interface, and all valid QWAC certificates are accepted. If you are facing issues accessing this interface using a test certificate, please reach out to us with the following:
* - The certificate used to access the interface,
* - Details of the request and response received
* You can see three folders: DEDICATED_AISP, DEDICATED_PISP and DEDICATED_CBPII. Each folder have the petitons related with its authoritazion.
